price: Barang siapa mengharap pertemuan dengan Allah, maka sesungguhnya waktu (yang dijanjikan) Allah pasti datang. Dan Dia Yang Maha Mendengar, Maha Mengetahui.
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yarjū liqāa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laātin wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
